intent_template: Find me the cheapest {{item}} {{condition}} and add one of any size to my shopping cart.
intent: Find me the cheapest shoe with marine life printed on it and add one of any size to my shopping cart.

instantiation_dict.condition: with marine life printed on it

must_include: MAPOLO Animals Words Men's Boys Casual Walking Shoes Sneaker Lightweight Stylish Athletic Tennis Sports Running Shoes for Outdoor Hiking Travel Driving
